title: Help With Config
body:
Hey guys, I am currently playing on my laptop with a broken q key. Being to lazy to replace it , i have been playing for months with a different config

i have shifted everything over one so Q=W , W=E , E= R , R=T 
I play with my four fingers on w,e,r,t and my thumb on v for an active item

Lately its been heaps frustrating when i try to auto level ...  i still click on my level ups and it puts me in a massive disadvantage during lane in some scenarios.

I have moved auto leveling to alt + Spells but it is like a mission to extend my thumb from v to alt 

Some one help me find a simpler alternative ( besides fixing my q k ) ill slap you , thank you {{item:3070}}

replies.body: Does it let you do shift + something else? If so, it might be better to do shift with your smallest finger.

Why don't you just move everything 1 row down and rotate whatever that's on the bottom row to the top number row (or somewhere else where you feel more comfortable since it only has like 2 buttons there anyway)? I am talking about default key settings here though.

That way, yes you can't make use of item slot 1 (it will now becomes the Q button), but at least that's better than non-functioning Q.
